prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
ARJUNAN A B
E-mail id: arjunan.bhaskar@gmail.com
Graphic Designer & Video Editor Portfolio: https://www.behance.net/arjunanbhaskar
PROFILE:
Experienced graphic designer with 5 years of proven expertise in creating captivating video
and static assets. Proficient in a wide range of design software and tools, with a strong
understanding of current design trends and techniques. Skilled in conceptualizing and developing
innovative design concepts, from initial ideation to final delivery.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:
 TVS ELECTRONICS PVT LTD - CHENNAI
Graphic Designer, Feb 2024 – Current
 Actively contribute to TVS Electronics as a Graphic Designer, overseeing projects from
start to finish for timely and high-quality delivery.
 Produce compelling graphic designs for various mediums including EDMs, Brochures,
Standees, Kanopies, Newsletters, and Social Media posts.
 Create engaging video content such as Explanation videos, whiteboard animations, and
Motion graphics, showcasing versatility and creativity in visual communication. Awarded
the Spot Recognition Award in March 2024 for exceptional commitment and excellence
in work.
 AYATI WORKS - CHENNAI
Motion Graphic Designer, Nov 2023 – Feb 2024
 Participated in all facets of motion graphics projects completion from start to finish,
ensuring that everything was finished in timely manner.
 Produced motion graphics for multiple Clients like Nippo, Herbale, Vels Group, Kolo
snacks and others.
 Created short animated videos, designed 3d assets, and operated the camera when
needed. TEAM CYCLE WORLD PVT LTD - BANGALORE
Motion Graphic Designer, June 2023 – Nov 2023
 Played an integral role at Team Cycle World Pvt Ltd, South India's largest bicycle retail
franchise, collaborating across teams to design impactful marketing video assets, leading
to enhanced ad performance.
 Introduced motion graphic videos to TCW's social media pages, designed over 100 static
and video assets, incorporated into public campaigns, amplifying brand
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
